articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Orphanage on Int'l Children's Day
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Orphanage on Int'l Children's Day
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Pyongyang Orphanage and congratulated the children there on the International Children's Day.
					 He said that he came to see the children of the orphanage greeting the day and shook hands with officials of the orphanage and teachers.
					
					 He was pleased to hear that the children who received gifts sent by him were greeting the day as significantly as others, visiting Mangyongdae Pleasure Park, eating noodle at Okryu Restaurant and playing sports games amid the interest of officials concerned and other people in their district.
					
					 When he entered the playroom of the orphanage, children vied with each other to cuddle up to him.
					
					 He told the children not to hurry so they might not fall down and patted their cheeks coming to his arms.
					
					 He kindly asked the children what they were playing and if they ate delicious food.
					
					 Looking at the children counting their fingers to tell how they spent the holiday, his face beaming with a broad smile, he said he was pleased to hear they were cheerfully greeting the day. He expressed great pleasure at seeing the happy smile of all children.
					
					 He clapped for the children who were singing songs just like kids acting cute before their real father.
					
					 Dropping in at the dining room, he asked children having their supper which food they found delicious.
					
					 He instructed cooks to prepare a variety of food with the same foodstuff to meet the taste of the children.
					
					 Seeing the menu for the holiday, he said:
					
					 "You served the children with tasty food as breakfast and lunch. I am very pleased to hear that they liked it."
					
					 He learned about how the variety of foodstuff sent by the WPK was cooked for the children, he taught the method of preparing nutritive food including honey. 
					
					 He gave an instruction to feed the children on the basis of the science of nutrition and let them have regular physical exercise including the exercise to help them grow tall in order to bring them up in good health.
					
					 He told the teachers to take care of the children the way their real parents do  in order to let them stoutly grow free from the sorrow of being orphans, noting that the whole country would become bright when their cheerful laughter was heard.
					
					 "It is said raising a child requires a lot of effort. The teachers are taking much trouble of bringing up many children of the orphanage."
					
					 He told them to bring them up well so that renowned scientists, sportsmen, artistes, soldiers and heroes may emerge from among them in the future.
					
					 Recalling that a modern baby home and orphanage are under construction on the bank of the River Taedong under the care of the Party, he said the children of the orphanage would greet the June 1 holiday at the newly built orphanage next year, adding that he would meet them again on that occasion.
					
					 He expressed his expectation and  conviction that the officials and teachers  of the orphanage would creditably perform their duties and thus carry forward the love of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the children and future generation after generation as they put forward them as the kings of the country and loved them all their lives.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Work of Developing Ssuk Islet
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Work of Developing Ssuk Islet
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave on-the-spot guidance to the work of developing Ssuk Islet.
					 Touring the islet, he set forth tasks and ways for developing the islet.
					
					 Underlining the need to develop the islet in a peculiar style as required by the new century, which is a pride of Pyongyang along with Rungna and Yanggak islets, he called for turning the islet associated with the feats of President Kim Il Sung into the one for scientific and technological study center.
					
					 Saying that demand for the dissemination of science and technology is increasing as the day goes by, Kim Jong Un noted that the Party determined to build a modern scientific and technological study  center on the islet to meet the requirements of the people.
					
					 The center to be built on the islet will function not only as a comprehensive data base for scientific and technological achievements made by mankind but also as a multi-purpose scientific and technological service center, which makes it possible to use all data and share and exchange information through a network any time, he noted.
					
					 He instructed officials to build the center at the highest level in the aspects of architectural beauty, formative art and architectural contents so that it may appear a building of national treasure and fashionable and world-class one.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on both banks of the River Taedong, he said the site was a very good place and the center to be built on the islet would serve as another springboard from which the country would surpass the world's level. He added he felt pleased to foresee the center.
					
					 Noting that the scientific and technological study center to be built on the islet is another gift of the WPK for the people, he specified measures for designing, construction and the supply of building materials, etc.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Examines Water Slide
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Examines Water Slide
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, examined a nose dive slide made by the KPA. 
					 Examining it, he learned in detail about how it was made.
					
					 Such type slide, the first of its kind in the country, was manufactured and it looked nice, he noted, adding that he was pleased with the fact that service personnel made it in a technologically perfect manner, while cutting down its production cost.
					
					 Saying that water parks are being built in different parts of the country, he underscored the need to mass-produce a variety of equipment for them including such slide.
					
					 The production of the slide once again proved the fact that if one is determined to do something, relying on one's own efforts, nothing is impossible, he stressed.
					
					 Noting that the slide was made as desired by the party, he instructed officials to install it at the outdoor water park of Songdowon International Children's Camp before any others.
					
					 Noting that the campers will be very much delighted to see the modern slide in the water park, he told officials to install the slide by the end of June as the sea bathing season is near at hand and make the cheerful laughter of children heard from there. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the People's Army would fulfill its mission as a standard-bearer and shock brigade in implementing the Party's plan and intention in the future, too.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Greetings to Italian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Italian President
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Giorgio Napolitano, president of Italy, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Italy would grow stronger in various fields in conformity with common interests and desires of the two peoples and wished the Italian people welling-being and prosperity.

articles.title: Mexican Party Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Mexican Party Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico led by Laura Julieta, member of its National Executive Committee, arrived here by air Monday.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Monument to Victorious Battle of Pochonbo
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visit Monument to Victorious Battle of Pochonbo
Hyesan, June 2 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of people including service personnel, school youth and children is visiting the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo on the occasion of the 77th anniversary of the historic victory in the battle.
					 The monument was erected to mark the victory in the battle led by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 The President made a gun report of victory in the homeland, thus horrifying the Japanese imperialist aggressors and instilling hope for national liberation into the people.
					
					 The monument was built in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province in Juche 56 (1967) to mark the 30th anniversary of the victorious battle.
					
					 Before the monument is the statue of the President who is in the van of the unit advancing toward the homeland, looking forward, with a pair of binoculars and military cap in his hand. Also on both sides of the monument are groups of sculptures depicting members of the guerrilla mercilessly smashing the enemy, rallied close around him, and the people from all walks of life who turned out in the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 Visitors to the monument have steadily increased for the past 47 years, reaching more than 8 645 000. They included those from units of the Korean People's Army, Kim Il Sung University, State Academy of Sciences, Ministry of Railways, Sangwon Cement Complex, Hyesan Youth Mine and Thongil Street Senior Secondary School in Raknang District.

articles.title: Sports Village in Pyongyang Renovated
articles.content:
Sports Village in Pyongyang Renovated
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The Sports Village in Chongchun Street, Pyongyang, has been successfully renovated.
					 All gyms and stadium and other buildings there took on a new look.
					
					 Recently supreme leader Kim Jong Un provided the remodeled village with advanced sports facilities to ensure games and training on a higher level.
					
					 The exterior of those structures was decorated in a peculiar way, and small parks and resting places were built, adding beauty to landscape of the sports village.
					
					 Parquet or rubber pads were laid on the floors of athletics and combat gyms, and new types of electronic score display installed at badminton, table-tennis, weightlifting and other gyms.
					
					 Referee room, dope check room, medical treatment room, massage room, shower room, video room and other facilities were arranged on a higher level.
					
					 More than 2 600 movable seats were laid at each of gymnasiums and the Sosan Football Stadium has 1 500 more seats than before.
					
					 Sports games and training are now going on at those remodeled gyms and stadium in the village.

articles.title: Family of Ceramists in DPRK
articles.content:
Family of Ceramists in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Ceramics "Vase with reticulated pattern of carp" and "Grape-patterned gourd-shaped teapot" exhibited by the DPRK at the 2014 Shanghai International Ceramic Art Expo were respectively awarded the best prize for creation and a bronze prize.
					 Those craftworks were created by U Pok Dan and U Chol Ryong (Merited Artiste), a daughter and a son of U Chi Son (Kim Il Sung Prize Winner and People's Artiste) who was a great master of Koryo celadon.
					
					 His works have been considered to be of great rarity in China, Japan and other countries for their rich and beautiful colors, refined shape, peculiar decoration, delicacy and high artistic value.
					
					 Typical of them are "Celadon pot with a pattern of chrysanthemum"(1964), "Vase incised with a pattern of sunflower" (1978), "Vase patterned with Pyongyang scenery" (1980) and "Gourd-shaped teapot with a pattern of cloud and crane" (1988).
					
					 U Chol Ryong has been working at the Porcelain Creative Group of the Mansudae Art Studio since Juche 77 (1988) after graduating from Pyongyang University of Fine Arts.
					
					 His craftworks have also been proved successful on several occasions, including the 1989 exhibition of modern Koryo celadon and painting masterpieces held in Japan and the north-south art exhibition in 1998.
					
					 In particular, his craftwork "Celadon vase with reticulated pattern of crane in cloud" won the first prize at the 2007 international ceramics expo held in China.
					
					 More than 20 pieces of his craftworks were listed as national treasures.
					
					 U Pok Dan is also a well-known ceramist who proved successful at several international expositions.
					
					 Both of them are now devoting themselves to further developing the Koryo celadon, which is associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean ancestors.

articles.title: Number of Chinese Tourists Grows in DPRK
articles.content:
Number of Chinese Tourists Grows in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The tour by Chinese was conducted in the Rason area of the DPRK from May 31 to June 2, under an agreement made between the DPRK's Rason International Travel Company and China's Yanbian Arirang International Travel Agency.
					 Involving in the tour were more than 40 Chinese, who toured Pipha Islet, the Rason Taehung Trading Company, Rajin Port and other places by private cars.
					
					 This was the eighth batch of Chinese this year to visit the DPRK by private cars.
					
					 In this regard, an official at the Tourism Bureau of the Rason City People's Committee, told KCNA:
					
					 The tour by private cars began in June Juche 100 (2011), with due ceremony in the Rason economic and trade zone. Since then, more than 1 300 tourists have made trips to the area by more than 300 private cars in 70-odd batches.
					
					 Other forms of tourism are expected to grow in scope.

articles.title: Unreasonable Conclusion of Military Agreement with Japan Opposed
articles.content:
Unreasonable Conclusion of Military Agreement with Japan Opposed
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Voices opposing military nexus with Japan are loudly heard in south Korea.
					 The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea released a commentary on May 29 disclosing the injustice of the sharing of military information with Japan. 
					
					 The commentary said the military authorities of south Korea, U.S. and Japan are mulling discussing the plan for sharing military information. This is the advance work to establish the U.S.-led missile defense system by sharing information about north's missiles between south Korea and Japan, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 To conclude an agreement between south Korea and Japan amounts to an act of removing obstacles in establishing the U.S.-led missile defense system as there are treaties which make it possible to share military information between south Korea and the U.S. and between the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 The commentary demanded the authorities of south Korea, U.S. and Japan not push forward cooperation through the sharing of military information but take measures for preventing a vicious cycle of confrontation.
					
					 An editorial titled "Dangerous agreement on sharing military information between south Korea and Japan" was posted on the internet newspaper Voice of People on May 30. 
					
					 The conclusion of the agreement is an act of shaking the security of society to its very foundation, the editorial said.
					
					 Stunning the public is the fact that Obama forced south Korea to intensify military cooperation with Japan and Park Geun Hye meekly accepted it.
					
					 The editorial demanded an immediate stop to the moves to conclude the agreement.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces "Saenuri Party" for Making Desperate Efforts to Tide over Ruling Crisis
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces "Saenuri Party" for Making Desperate Efforts to Tide over Ruling Crisis
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The June 4 elections to local self-governing bodies to be held in south Korea in the wake of the ferry Sewol disaster are not a mere election but an acute life-and-death struggle decisive to the destiny of popular masses, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" of south Korea is making desperate efforts to evade the people's stern judgment and tide over the ruling crisis in the local elections.
					
					 The group of traitors is persisting in its plots and deceptive moves to quell the angered people's mindset as it knows well that if the elections are held under the political situation caused by the ferry Sewol disaster, it is bound to be defeated. It is disgusting that with the approach of the elections the coteries of the "Saenuri Party" are making such ostentatious commitments as "establishment of the system for coping with disaster", "tailored welfare" for the old and children and "creation of more jobs for women". The puppet chief executive is joining it.
					
					 And the puppet ruling forces are unhesitatingly committing the merciless suppression of demonstrators who take the lead in the anti-"government" struggle.
					
					 The puppet forces are getting frantic in the moves to fake up the "north wind" with a trite method in a bid to divert the public attention elsewhere and calm down the anti-"government" spirit.
					
					 Legitimate activities of political parties and organizations and freedom of media, thoughts and expression and elementally human rights are being mercilessly violated in south Korea owing to the present puppet regime's fascist rule. 
					
					 If the south Korean people are taken in by the group of traitors again, this will totally obliterate democracy and bring miserable death to the working people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps S. Korean Warmongers' Military Provocation Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps S. Korean Warmongers' Military Provocation Moves
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet bellicose forces fired shells at the navy warships of the Korean People's Army on a routine guard duty in the hot spot of the West Sea. They are floating rumors that "the north fired shells first" like a thief crying "Stop thief", escalating provocation racket. They even staged the largest-ever drills for emergency sorties, blustering that they would "make a relentless punishment if the north provokes".
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in this regard:
					
					 What can never be overlooked is that the puppet military is escalating provocation ruckus while deliberately straining the situation.
					
					 It is the aim of the puppet military to push tensions to an extreme phase and pave the way of the present regime driven into the worst ruling crisis in a bid to curry favor with Park Geun Hye and escalate confrontation with the north and ignite a war against it.
					
					 Such reckless act is creating even the danger of unpredictable armed clash between the north and the south.
					
					 The Korean nation can neither live in peace nor can south Korea escape from misfortune and disaster as long as the puppet military war-like forces are left as intact.
					
					 They should be punished at an early date as they are bringing holocaust to the nation in a bid to attain their sinister political purpose. This is a conclusion made by the DPRK again.
					
					 If the DPRK starts merciless and thoroughgoing strike, the puppet military hooligans will not go scot-free.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group had better stop at once foolish military provocations which will bring self-destruction to it.

articles.title: Limitless Investigation for Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Limitless Investigation for Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The Bar Association for Democratic Society of south Korea held a meeting in Ansan, Kyonggi Province on May 29 calling for thoroughly probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The association made public the results of intermediary examination of the 17-point task proposed for the probe into the truth on May 8.
					
					 It is possible to hold the maritime police responsible for the compensation for damage and charge it with the violation of the "law on public workers", neglect of its duty, accidental homicide on duty and murder as it deliberately did not take rescue measures though it could save hundreds of passengers aboard the sinking ferry, it noted.
					
					 It underlined the need to make a limitless investigation into not only the captain and crewmen of the ferry but also the "government" and supervision organs.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Urges IS to Probe Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Urges IS to Probe Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public an open questionnaire on May 30 demanding the Intelligence Service (IS) to probe the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster, according to the south Korea internet newspaper Jaju Minbo.
					 Suspicion about IS's involvement in the disaster is snowballing, the questionnaire said, and went on:
					
					 First, when and from whom did the IS was informed of the ferry Sewol sinking accident for the first time?
					
					 According to Kyunghyang Daily News, the director of the Chonghaejin Maritime Transport Company informed the IS of the accident at 09:10.
					
					 But the "prime minister" said on May 20 he knew that the IS received a report on the accident by telephone and it was made by a crewman of the ferry, the daily news said.
					
					 However, the IS has asserted that it heard the news of the accident through radio at 09:44.
					
					 The IS, which has made lies, should make clear the fact immediately.
					
					 Second, has the IS known the fact that it was the first organ to be informed of the maritime accident according to the "report system" as regards the ferry Sewol worked out in February 25 last year? Why was the exceptional channel for making reports to the IS built?
					
					 There are many accusations that it is against common knowledge that a non-governmental company should directly report the accidents to the IS.
					
					 The IS should clarify the reason why the system of making primary report to it was applied to the ferry Sewol only.
					
					 Gushing out is the criticism that the IS received a report about the accident before anyone else but did not take relevant measures, a neglect of its duty, the questionnaire said, demanding it make clear what it did after receiving the report.

articles.title: Action for Checking Election Rigging Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Checking Election Rigging Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- An article calling for checking possible election rigging by the south Korean puppet "regime" in the June 4 elections to local self-governing bodies, was posted on the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo on May 28. It was contributed by Paek Nam Ju, permanent researcher of the "Our Society Institute" of south Korea.
					 It has been disclosed that the Intelligence Service (IS) and other power organs illegally interfered in the past "presidential election" and suspicion about the central election administration committee's illegal interference in the election is being uninterruptedly aroused, the article noted, adding:
					
					 There is a possibility that the June 4 elections to local self-governing bodies at hand would become fraudulent ones.
					
					 This is because the IS and the military cyber command which perpetrated illegal red-herring operations during the election are still functioning without being punished and there is no proper system related to the election.
					
					 Moreover, as the present regime has pinned their fate on the elections, fraudulent elections might be cooked up in all regions.
					
					 The "government" should no longer interfere in the elections, noted the article, calling on all people to pool their efforts so that such election rigging might not be perpetrated.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, was formed in Russia on May 28.
					 The remembrance committee consists of Russian prominent figures with V. A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, as chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Britain
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A British committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in London on May 27.
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, was elected as chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange such colorful events as a meeting, film show and seminar praising the revolutionary career and feats of the President from May 28 to July 8.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Serbian Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Serbian Political Figure
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was a historical event of great significance in developing the WPK and carrying out the socialist cause and the cause of independence against imperialism.
					 Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, said in a statement on May 27:
					
					 Kim Jong Il performed extraordinary feats in party-building and activities while leading the WPK for a long period.
					
					 His theories on party building and exploits he performed by leading the party are a true textbook which all progressive political parties should regard as guidelines in their struggle.
					
					 He devoted all his life to firmly defending independence and socialism.
					
					 The DPRK dynamically advanced along the road of socialism under his wise leadership even when the east European socialist countries collapsed in the closing year of the last century.
					
					 The DPRK thoroughly rejected the U.S. imperialists' pressure and flunkeyism and firmly defended independence.
					
					 The WPK is vigorously advancing along the road of independence, the road of Songun and the road of socialism, holding supreme leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem, and will register greater successes in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Seminars on Exploits of Kim Jong Il Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Exploits of Kim Jong Il Held Abroad
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Bangladesh, Indonesia and Nigeria between May 24 and 27 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of his start of the work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venues of the seminars were photos dealing with exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also exhibited there were photos showing successes made by the army and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Present there were figures of all social strata of relevant countries and masses.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il built the WPK into an ideological integral whole, a party which achieved the firm unity and cohesion and a genuine mother party which serves the people.
					
					 Baharudin Basir, director of the Dwi Mitra Perkasa of Indonesia, said that exploits Kim Jong Il performed by developing the WPK into an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people will be immortal.
					
					 A reporter and speakers including Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, praised the undying Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il who smashed the imperialists' aggression and high-handed and arbitrary practices and firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and global peace and security.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Love for Children
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Love for Children
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The children in the DPRK greeted the June 1 International Children's Day with joy under the benevolent care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un provides the best things to the children before anyone else, calling them kings of the country. Fish, fruits and modern freezing facilities associated with his warm loving care were conveyed to the baby homes and orphanages across the country and Kim Jong Suk Nursery, Kyongsang and Changgwang kindergarteners.
					
					 He sent fruits according to seasons, a variety of foodstuffs and medicines to children and again showed warm solicitude for them greeting the holiday this time. Children were deeply stirred by his benevolent care. 
					
					 Officials, nurses, educators and parents of children are convinced of a rose future of children who will grow stoutly with nothing more to desire in the world under his care.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se reune con huerfanos por Dia Internacional de la Infancia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se reune con huerfanos por Dia Internacional de la Infancia
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el Orfanato de Pyongyang para felicitar a los huerfanos con motivo del Dia Internacional de la Infancia.
					Estrechando la mano con los funcionarios y asistentes del orfanato, el Mariscal dijo que vino para ver a los huerfanos que acogen el Primero de Junio.
					
					Escucho muy satisfecho el parte de que los huerfanos recibieron los regalos, se divirtieron en el Parque de Atracciones de Mangyongdae, comieron el fideo en el famoso Restaurante Okryu y pasan con alegria la fiesta de la infancia sin envidiar a nadie haciendo juegos deportivos bajo la atencion de los funcionarios y los habitantes del contorno.
					
					Cuando el Mariscal entro en la sala de diversion, los huerfanos se precipitaron hacia su regazo.
					
					El Mariscal calmo a los ninos diciendo que tuvieran cuidado con caerse y les acaricio por la mejilla preguntando carinosamente que juegos han hecho y si han comido alimentos sabrosos.
					
					Mirando sonriente a los huerfanos que le responden contando con los dedos lo que han hecho, apunto que le complace mucho ver a ellos que pasan su fiesta riendose todos.
					
					Cuando los huerfanos interpretaron las canciones, el les envio aplausos.
					
					En el comedor donde los huerfanos cenaban, les pregunto que plato les gusta mas e instruyo cocinar con mismas materias primas variados platos que avengan al apetito de los ninos.
					
					Al ver el menu de fiesta, dijo que los huerfanos comieron platos sabrosos en el desayuno y el almuerzo y eso le complace mucho.
					
					Tras averiguar como cocinan los alimentos enviados por el Partido, enseno los metodos de ingestion de alimentos nutritivos como la miel y subrayo que para criar sanos a los ninos, es necesario alimentarlos bien en lo nutritivo al paralelo de los ejercicios fisicos rutinarios como los necesarios para el crecimiento de estatura.
					
					Si los ninos crecen felices, todo el pais se pondra alegre, senalo y encomendo a las asistentes del orfanato que atendieran con afecto maternal a los huerfanos para que ellos crezcan sin sentir la tristeza de haber perdido a sus padres.
					
					Aprecio los esfuerzos de las asistentes diciendo que cuesta enorme trabajo para criar a un hijo y les encomendo nuevamente que formaran bien a los huerfanos como futuros cientificos, deportistas, artistas y militares de renombre.
					
					Informo que se construyen a las riberas del rio Taedong nuevos hospicios y orfanatos por la iniciativa del partido.
					
					Agrego que los huerfanos pasaran el Primero de Junio del ano proximo en el nuevo orfanato y propuso reunirse otra vez en ese dia.
					
					Kim Jong Un manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y asistentes del Orfanato de Pyongyang cumpliran bien sus deberes y materializaran asi el noble amor por las generaciones venideras del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il que amaban muchos a los ninos en toda su vida considerandolos como reyes del pais.
					
					El fue acompanado en esta visita por el vicemariscal del EPC, Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno labor de desarrollo del islote Suk
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno labor de desarrollo del islote Suk
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la labor de desarrollo del islote Suk.
					El Mariscal presento las tareas y remedios que se presentan en el desarrollo dando recorrido por el islote.
					
					Vamos a desarrollar con particularidad conforme a la demanda de nuevo siglo el islote Suk, uno de los islotes famosos de Pyongyang como el Rungna y el Yanggak, dijo y exhorto a convertir ese islote que transmite las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung en el de ciencias donde se situara un centro de ciencias y tecnicas.
					
					Apunto que se eleva cada dia mas la demanda sobre la divulgacion de los conocimientos cientificos y tecnicos y subrayo que el Partido decidio levantar alli un moderno centro de ciencias y tecnicas que posibilite satisfacer las demandas de los habitantes.
					
					Asevero que el centro de ciencias y tecnicas a ser construido en el islote Suk servira tanto del centro universal que conservara todos los logros cientificos y tecnicos alcanzados por la humanidad como de la base de servicio cientifico y tecnico multifuncional que pueda ver en cualquier momento diversos archivos a traves de la red y compartir e intercambiar las informaciones.
					
					Exhorto a levantarlo como patrimonio nacional, lo mas vistoso de talla mundial, al construir en maximo nivel tanto en lo arquitectonico-estetico, en lo plastico-artistico como en el contenido.
					
					Mirando ambos lados del rio Taedong, destaco que aqui es un sitio apropiado para construir ese centro y agrego que le complace mucho cuando imagina ese centro que sera otro trampolin que permite a nuestro pais avanzar al mundo.
					
					El Mariscal subrayo que el centro de ciencias y tecnicas a ser construido en el islote Suk es otro regalo que ofrece el PTC al pueblo y tomo las medidas concretas para el diseno, construccion y suministro de materiales.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un pasa revista a tobogan elaborado por EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un pasa revista a tobogan elaborado por EPC
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, paso revista al tobogan en picado elaborado nuevamente por el EPC.
					El Mariscal se entero en detalles del proceso de elaboracion del tobogan.
					
					Aunque sea por primera vez en nuestro pais, el tobogan fue elaborado con excelencia, dijo y le agrada mucho que este se haya hecho muy perfecto en lo tecnologico y a poco precio.
					
					Recordo que ahora se levantan las piscinas en diversas localidades del pais y destaco la necesidad de producir mas las variadas instalaciones de diversion acuatica como el tobogan en picado para enviarlas a los lugares de recreacion.
					
					Subrayo que se comprobo la verdad de que no hay una cosa imposible cuando se confia en sus fuerzas propias.
					
					Evaluo que el mencionado tobogan fue elaborado en la norma deseada por el Partido y propuso colocarlo primero en la piscina al aire libre del Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon.
					
					Entonces, los campistas sentiran felices, asevero y ordeno colocarlo hasta finales de junio porque ya llego el tiempo de banarse en el mar.
					
					Expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, el EPC cumplira con su obligacion de jinete en materializar el proyecto y proposito del Partido.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por Hwang Pyong So, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia provocaciones militares del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia provocaciones militares del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los belicistas  surcoreanos abrieron fuego a los buques de las fuerzas navales de la parte Norte que estaban en la ordinaria guardia de vigilancia en la zona candente del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					En tanto arman alborotos provocativos difundiendo el infundado rumor de que "el Norte disparo primero los proyectiles" y desarrollaron los ejercicios de despegue emergente de gran envergadura abogando por la "represalia despiadada en caso de provocacion del Norte de Corea". 
					
					Asi, la capa militar surcoreana agrava intencionalmente la situacion intensificando de modo escalonado la campana provocativa. 
					
					Revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este lunes y continua: 
					
					De esta manera, la capa militar titere  persigue atraer la simpatia de Park Geun-hye al salvar el "poder" actual que se encuentra en la peor crisis de gobernacion e intensificar mas el enfrentamiento fratricida y la campana de guerra de agresion contra la RPDC. 
					
					Tales maniobras crean hasta el peligro de choque armado Norte-Sur cuya consecuencia sera imprevisible. 
					
					Al dejarlos intactos, la nacion coreana no podra llevar una vida tranquila ni eludir las desgracias y desastres en el suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Pues, sacamos la conclusion de que hay que castigar lo mas pronto posible a los belicistas surcoreanos que traen los desastres nacionales bajo los designios politicos malintencionados. 
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye debe parar de inmediato sus absurdas provocaciones militares que le llevaran a la autodestruccion.
